content.body: shu: I pulled in your ecmarkup PR to your 262 branch; be sure to pull before making other changes
content.formatted_body: shu: I pulled in your ecmarkup PR to your 262 branch; be sure to pull before making other changes

content.body: a suggestion i got internally is to have the [UC] marker be in the AO heading as well (with the section number)
seems like a fine idea to me
Would that show up in copy/pasting of the section?
Depends on how it was implemented
the current CSS is that none of the markers show up in copy/paste
shu: do you think it should also go in the ToC? that would be maybe a bit cluttered
content.formatted_body: shu: do you think it should also go in the ToC? that would be maybe a bit cluttered

content.body: i don't think it should go into the ToC, no
